title: New: X Priest X – Dark Sun (Demo)
content:
Moving slightly away from the Grimes influenced sound that dominated their impressive debut track, Samurai, Florida trio X Priest X channel more of an M83 vibe on latest track Dark Sun.

Still in ‘demo’ form, no doubt a decision made that will allow them to retreat to a studio at some point, and put finishing touches to the track, it’s bolder and more stadium ready than their previous outing, yet no less impressive. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
